reactor.core

接口 Disposable.Swap

  • 所有超级接口:
    Disposable, Supplier<Disposable>
    封闭接口:
    Disposable

    public static interface Disposable.Swap
extends Disposable, Supplier<Disposable>
    A Disposable container that allows updating/replacing its inner Disposable atomically and with respect of disposing the container itself.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 reactor.core.Disposable

        Disposable.Composite, Disposable.Swap

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean replace(Disposable next)
      Atomically push the next Disposable on this container but don't dispose the previous one (if any).
      boolean update(Disposable next)
      Atomically push the next Disposable on this container and dispose the previous one (if any).

      • 从接口继承的方法 reactor.core.Disposable

        dispose, isDisposed

      • 从接口继承的方法 java.util.function.Supplier

        get

    • 方法详细资料

      • update

        boolean update(@Nullable
               Disposable next)
        Atomically push the next Disposable on this container and dispose the previous one (if any). If the container has been disposed, fall back to disposing next.
        参数:
        next - the Disposable to push, may be null
        返回:
        true if the operation succeeded, false if the container has been disposed
        另请参阅:
        replace(Disposable)

      • replace

        boolean replace(@Nullable
                Disposable next)
        Atomically push the next Disposable on this container but don't dispose the previous one (if any). If the container has been disposed, fall back to disposing next.
        参数:
        next - the Disposable to push, may be null
        返回:
        true if the operation succeeded, false if the container has been disposed
        另请参阅:
        update(Disposable)
